course_name: Executive Post-Graduate Certification in AI-Powered Full Stack Development
description: This program offers a combination of core Computer Science concepts and hands-on application development experience, designed for software developers who need to think and implement end-to-end solutions.48]
eligibility: Bachelor's Degree or final year students with 50% or equivalent marks. Prior coding knowledge is preferred.

projects.title: Culinary Compass
projects.description: An application to discover nearby restaurants, mastering software engineering fundamentals like UML, JUnit, Mockito testing, and Test Driven Development. 226, 228]

projects.title: AutoMarket Hub
projects.description: A dynamic platform for buying and reselling cars, offering hands-on opportunity to apply HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap skills. 234]

projects.title: PhoneSphere Explorer
projects.description: A user-friendly frontend application to add and explore mobile phones, honing skills in DOM manipulation and creating a responsive website. 240]

projects.title: Hotel Room Booking
projects.description: A practice project to create a website for booking hotel rooms, covering frontend features like HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and AJAX. 246]

projects.title: Game Library
projects.description: A small web application on React to host 5 different games, covering basic concepts of React.js like components, hooks, props, and context. 252]

modules.description: Learn the foundational elements of Java programming, including syntax, data types, and control structures.
Explore Java's powerful object-oriented paradigm, mastering classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.
Dive deeper into Java with topics like multithreading, file handling, exceptions, and lambda expressions.
Learn about software design, UML diagrams, testing and version control concepts.
Understand algorithm efficiency and learn techniques for bit manipulation.
Master data structures like arrays and linked lists, and gain proficiency in operations and manipulation.
Explore essential data structures - stacks and queues and their applications in algorithmic problem-solving.
Learn various searching and sorting algorithms and analyze their time complexity.
Understand the Greedy algorithmic paradigm and apply it to solve optimization problems.
Master the art of dynamic programming for solving complex problems by breaking them down into simpler subproblems.
Explore graphs, their representations, and algorithms like DFS and BFS for traversal and pathfinding.
Learn the fundamental building blocks of web development - HTML and CSS, and enhance your skills with Bootstrap for responsive design.

modules.module_title: Fundamentals of Node JS and JavaScript
modules.description: Gain proficiency in Node.js for server-side JavaScript development and understand core JavaScript concepts.
Deepen your understanding of JavaScript with topics like ES6, closures, promises, async/await, and modules.
Dive into building dynamic and interactive user interfaces with the powerful React JS library.
Understand prompt engineering and learn code generation, translation, and reviews using GenAI tools like ChatGPT, Github Copilot, Phind AI, Bloop Al, Tabnine and more for frontend.
Explore the basics of Express.js to build robust and scalable backend applications.
Learn to work with MongoDB, a NoSQL database, and integrate it seamlessly into your applications.
Design and develop RESTful APIs to enable smooth communication between the frontend and backend.
Implement secure user authentication and handle errors effectively to ensure a seamless user experience.
Learn to use GenAI for backend code generation, translation, and reviews. Also, learn how GenAI can analyze code to predict errors and implement AI-driven security measures.
modules.duration: Shared within 1 month with Backend Dev

modules.description: Learn GenAI-powered static code analysis, how to improve testing and integration, design seamless applications, and optimize them using GenAI tools.
Understand the principles of distributed systems and apply design patterns to build scalable and resilient applications.
Learn the art of designing complex systems, focusing on scalability, reliability, and performance.
In the Capstone Project, students apply their knowledge and skills to develop a comprehensive full-stack application.
